message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm starting the bidding at $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for an item of this caliber.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $950,000 is significantly below its true value and my initial asking price.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000 to move this negotiation forward. I believe this price reflects the value this product will bring you.
I understand Alice, but I still believe we can find common ground. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,000,000.
